Colorscheme: goodnight

  • Modified version of Base16 Tomorrow Night which the name is meant to reference
  • Philosophy: uniform color scheme for all command line utilities
  • Refer to base16 styling guidelines when in doubt
256 color terminal Base16 Color Hex Purpose
0 Base00 ________________ #0d0d0d Normal bg
1 Base08 ________________ #c36060
2 Base0B ________________ #a7bd68
3 Base0A ________________ #e8c580
4 Base0D ________________ #7d9fbd
5 Base0E ________________ #a684b0
6 Base0C ________________ #88bab0
7 Base05 ________________ #d0d0d0 Normal fg
8 Base03 ________________ #5f6160 Comment
9 - ________________ #c36060
10 - ________________ #a7bd68
11 - ________________ #e8c580

13 - ________________ #a684b0
14 - ________________ #88bab0

16 Base09 ________________ #d17c6b
17 Base0F ________________ #a3685a
18 Base01 ________________ #222525 Statusline/border bg
19 Base02 ________________ #313438 Selection I prefer inverted fg/bg for visual mode
20 Base04 ________________ #909090 Darker fg
21 - ________________ #767676 Darker darker fg
22 Base06 ________________ #eaeaea Lighter fg
23 - ________________ #404040 Nvim inactive line number
24 - ________________ #7d7d7d Nvim inactive search match
25 - ________________ #656e6e Nvim inactive window label
